introductory: I'm currently enrolled in a distance education program at Edugrade,a leading vocational school for .NET system development with AI expertise. I'm in the last semester, gained a deep understanding of system development principles and applying Azure AI techniques.

experiences.title: Bike Curier at Foodora
experiences.description: I kicked off my city life by diving into the hustle as a bike courier. It's been quite the ride, and the experiences have been eye-opening. Along the way, I've observed variations in city structures and living spaces, witnessing the diversity that comes with it.

experiences.title: Contract based painter
experiences.description: I jumped into the painting scene, taking on contracts to splash color on both the inside and outside of houses. It was a gig that brought out my artistic side and kept the creative juices flowing.

experiences.title: Agricultural work
experiences.description: Spent a good chunk of my working life knee-deep in the farming world, juggling both part-time and full-time gigs. It was a hands-in-the-dirt kind of hustle that shaped a big part of my journey.

educations.title: Edugrade
educations.description: .NET System Developer with AI Expertise. Edugrade Vocational College. Sundsvall, Sweden.

educations.title: Distribution Electrician
educations.description: Education and Training Programs in Electrical Engineering.

educations.title: Secondary School/High school
educations.description: I graduated in Technical program, year 2015. Learned how to code and do 3D modeling.
